Covid-19 Store Reopening Protocols


Challenge

How do you keep your brick and mortar business operational when Covid-19 threatened to upend the industry overnight?

In order to keep stores open and operational, the business required an urgent training solution to educate staff on Covid-19 protocols and pass Ministry of Labor inspections during the peak of the Covid-19 pandemic.


Solution

In the absence of video production and in-class training, I rapidly developed an e-Learning solution that leveraged the 2D/3D vector animations to provide situational and environment-dependent safety training to the retail staff. With limited time, resources and planning, I designed the store layouts from scratch, illustrated significant ops protocols with simple animations, and provided a lighthearted learning experience to highly stressed and overwhelmed retail personnel. Results: Every ministry health inspection passed; staff remained safe; stores remained open, generating revenue in the succeeding quarters.


Technologies Used

After Effects, Audition, Illustrator, Storyline
